Key Match Events: Kevin Durant scored 32 points to lead the Suns to a 15-point comeback victory over the Heat
Jusuf Nurkic's commanding performance with 20 points and 18 rebounds was crucial in the Suns' late rally
Tyler Herro scored 28 points for the Heat, keeping them competitive throughout the game
Post-Match Reflections: The Heat's early-season struggles continue as they search for consistency
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was delayed by 30 minutes due to a power outage
Others: The Suns picked up their sixth-straight win over the Heat
